segments.text: How about your grades of study ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I had been doing quite well . In all subjects , I got excellent scores .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well . In that case , you must have got good records in English , too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I was the top student among my classmates .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Quite well . I took the National English Speaking Contest in CCTV 2008 and I got first place .
segments.speaker: S2
